title: Directive Principles of State Policy (DPSP)
description: Part IV (Articles 36-51) - State's TO-DO list for Social & Economic Democracy

subTopics.title: DPSP — Introduction & Complete Module
subTopics.description: Complete module covering origin, features, classification, and 150 questions

subTopics.title: Article 36 — Definition of State (DPSP)
subTopics.description: Article 36 defines 'State' for the purpose of Part IV (DPSP).

subTopics.title: Article 37 — Nature of DPSP
subTopics.description: Article 37 declares DPSP as fundamental but non-enforceable by courts.
